      • startUpdateChecker

        public void startUpdateChecker(int milliseconds,
                               IDatasetChangeChecker checker)
        Description copied from interface: IDynamicShape
        Starts a periodic checker to see if dataset has changed in some manner. If any potential changes are detected after the period has finished then registered listeners are alerted. A period of 0 or less will stop any existing checker.
        Specified by:
        startUpdateChecker in interface IDynamicShape
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - period between checks in milliseconds
        checker - can be null for default implementation of alerting listeners unconditionally
